Add.Title: Change the theme
Add.Content:
Change the theme

Personalize your website with the theming tool or one of the many themes.

  • Bootstrap Theming
    Learn how to quickly make and change the theme
  • Bootstrap Sample Themes
    Make use of one of the prepared themes

Add.Title: Manage spots
Add.Content:
Manage spots

On this starter site you can manage spots in the "Website Items", Content Sports" folder.

You can add spots to your content using "Insert", "Function", "Content.ShowContentSpots".

Add.Title: Statement spot with image and link
Add.Content:
<html xmlns='http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml'> <head></head> <body>
<f:function name="PageBlocks.IconifiedStatements" xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0"><f:param name="Image" value="MediaArchive:2a402f8c-a108-4b72-8e8e-0a6ef95b8637" xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" /><f:param name="Heading" value="Aside spot with image and link" xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" /><f:param name="Statement" value="Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the" xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" /><f:param name="Link" value="~/page(b49b64e3-ee0a-4b12-b55f-6228210e4e8f)" xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" /></f:function>
</body> </html>
